[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”hero-banner-row” css=”.vc_custom_1611734463449{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Clarity-Process-Banner-Image-Confetti-Design-1.jpg?id=10880) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1611732426012{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” disable_background_image=”” fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1611734782290{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”ssl lp-main-section” simple_background_image=”11580″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1611734818288{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Is your branding & website making the right first impression?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

You have less than six seconds to impress!
Make an amazing connection with a potential customer by presenting your business in the right way.
Wouldn’t you love to know how?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

Book your brand / website audit today, only $129
VALUED at over $440.00
Including a personally recorded video and 1:1 20 minute consultation.
Book your audit instantly by clicking the button and paying via PayPal.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_raw_html css=”.vc_custom_1517539649753{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1496962976690{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” fullwidth=”true” equal_columns=”true” attached=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1517538205277{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

A Brand Audit reveals whether your brand / website really reflects:

who you are, the problems you solve and how you deliver value

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner attached=”true” column_padding=”2″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Reviewing how your business and services are presented through your existing website will highlight why you might be missing an opportunity to CONNECT with your perfect customer.

Most businesses rely, to some extent, on a website to communicate what they do, how they do that, why they do that and, what value they can deliver to their clients.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

With the advent of off-shore designers and website builders like Wix and Squarespace it has become quick and relatively easy to get a brand and website up and running. But this has created the problem that the resulting brands and websites appearing ill-considered and even rushed. Brand identities aren’t extended consistently into websites or social media channels. In the worst cases, they don’t offer anything that real people are actually looking for, or present themselves as the amazing business owners they are. Potential clients are lost in a matter of seconds.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”20″ equal_height=”yes” fullwidth=”true” equal_columns=”true” el_class=”icon-box lp-grid-section” css=”.vc_custom_1611736583478{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Confetti-Design-Website-Maintenance-Services1.jpg?id=11664) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736154028{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1611736179062{border-top-width: 4px !important;border-right-width: 4px !important;border-bottom-width: 4px !important;border-left-width: 4px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;border-left-color: #cb0044 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #cb0044 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #cb0044 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #cb0044 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods-inner”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1497062165108{margin-top: 1% !important;margin-right: 1% !important;margin-bottom: 1% !important;margin-left: 1% !important;padding-top: 2% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-eye” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#cb0044″ css=”.vc_custom_1497062534470{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

You see your brand or website like a customer sees it

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736159121{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods”][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false” column_padding=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736183590{border-top-width: 4px !important;border-right-width: 4px !important;border-bottom-width: 4px !important;border-left-width: 4px !important;border-left-color: #cb0044 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #cb0044 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #cb0044 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #cb0044 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods-inner”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487931788085{margin-top: 1% !important;margin-right: 1% !important;margin-bottom: 1% !important;margin-left: 1% !important;padding-top: 2% !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-line-chart” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#cb0044″ css=”.vc_custom_1497063491184{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Improved customer
conversions

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736163517{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods”][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false” column_padding=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736187846{border-top-width: 4px !important;border-right-width: 4px !important;border-bottom-width: 4px !important;border-left-width: 4px !important;border-left-color: #cb0044 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #cb0044 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #cb0044 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #cb0044 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods-inner”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487931792812{margin-top: 1% !important;margin-right: 1% !important;margin-bottom: 1% !important;margin-left: 1% !important;padding-top: 2% !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-thumbs-o-up” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#cb0044″ css=”.vc_custom_1496846693304{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Improved confidence in your business

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736168178{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods”][vc_row_inner column_padding=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736192768{border-top-width: 4px !important;border-right-width: 4px !important;border-bottom-width: 4px !important;border-left-width: 4px !important;border-left-color: #cb0044 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #cb0044 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #cb0044 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #cb0044 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”icon-col-pods-inner”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487931797606{margin-top: 1% !important;margin-right: 1% !important;margin-bottom: 1% !important;margin-left: 1% !important;padding-top: 2% !important;}”][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-check-square-o” color=”custom” size=”lg” align=”center” custom_color=”#cb0044″ css=”.vc_custom_1496846723231{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Tangible actions to present your business better

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1517540387781{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Improved-customer-conversions-confetti-design-1.jpeg?id=11582) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Book your brand and website audit today,
only $129

VALUED at over $440.00
Improve your customer conversions and grow your business.
Start connecting more with your customers with a consistent brand and online profile.

Book your audit instantly by clicking the button and paying via PayPal.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_raw_html css=”.vc_custom_1517539667476{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” fullwidth=”true” column_padding=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1517505632665{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” simple_background_color=”#f6f6f6″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

css=”.vc_custom_1611736650470{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}” el_class=”lp-grid-section”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

What others are saying about having a Confetti Design Audit. 

It’s not like the other automated responses. This is personal, specific and powerfully useful.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1611735053000{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}” el_class=”lp-quote-row”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517505401475{border-left-width: 2px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;border-left-color: #cb0044 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}”]I found the review very useful.
I’ve had reviews by other designers or industry experts and I can honestly say I did not get 10% of the benefit from them that I got from your feedback.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1611735058824{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}” el_class=”lp-quote-row”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517505418795{border-left-width: 2px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;border-left-color: #cb0044 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}”]It was great to see my business brand and website from someone else’s point of view. We have already made a couple of small changes to the website, and took Johannah’s advice on pretty much all of her suggestions. The greatest benefit was it is a hands on look, rather than reading a document.
You can actually see what Johannah’s talking about as you are going through it. It is great to see someone’s point of view from their first viewing![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1611735063505{padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}” el_class=”lp-quote-row”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517505432330{border-left-width: 2px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;border-left-color: #cb0044 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}”]Having the video was great to follow along as Johannah spoke about the website to know exactly what she was looking at and giving feedback on specific areas. If it was in an email or over the phone I do not think it would be as effective. The feedback was so useful and we will definitely be making the suggested changes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” disable_background_image=”” fullwidth=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1611736800922{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” simple_background_image=”11662″ el_class=”lp-grid-section” el_id=”how-icons-section”][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611736964744{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text]

How does it work

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-video-camera” color=”custom” custom_color=”#cb0044″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]Step 1[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text] We record a video as we review your online brand presence including website [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-check-square-o” color=”custom” custom_color=”#cb0044″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]Step 2[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Within 24 hours you receive not only access to a video recording of your review, but also our list of 12 must-haves to great and effective web design with recommendations for design and functionality improvements so even if you don’t use us you know how to improve your site or branding to start building a consistent message.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-laptop” color=”custom” custom_color=”#cb0044″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]Step 3[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We can then book in your consultation. With these recommendations from your video and our call, you’ll be able to implement changes when and if you choose. Alternatively, I can assist you to implement the most important improvements by helping you to better structure the information, with copywriting and website implementation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611737301388{padding-top: 2% !important;}” el_class=”right-col-img”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_single_image image=”15023″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”lp-mobile-img” css=”.vc_custom_1611737289901{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1517540403549{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Improved-customer-conversions-confetti-design-1.jpeg?id=11582) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Book your brand and website audit today,
only $129

VALUED at over $440.00
Improve your customer conversions.
Uncover the secrets to start connecting more with your customers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_raw_html css=”.vc_custom_1517539681681{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1611734867291{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

<title>Live Recorded Business Brand & Website Audit - Confetti Design</title>
<meta name="description" content="Is your branding and website making the right first impression? Are you letting yourself down with amateurish online presence? Get an expert to do a review of how you are stacking up. Confetti Design offers a live recorded business brand and website audit so you can improve your customer attraction rates. Book today" />

Get an expert to do a review of how you are stacking up. Confetti Design offers a live recorded business brand and website audit so you can improve your customer attraction rates. Book today" />
